metadata.title: Thursday, 12th December, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    which companies were recently awarded contracts to supply about 42,000 tonnes of urea fertiliser for the 2013/2014 farming season;
(b)    what criteria were used in awarding the contracts to the companies;
(c)    why local companies with stocks of fertiliser were not contracted to supply the commodity; and
(d)    why Eastern Province was left out of the distribution list for the locally sourced fertiliser.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the Government will commence construction of the following infrastructure in the newly created Chipili District:
(i)    civic centre; (ii)   high cost houses; and (iii)  council rest houses; and
(b)    what the time-frame for construction of the above infrastructure is.
(a)    how much it costs Nitrogen Chemicals of Zambia (NCZ) to produce 1 kilogramme of compound D fertiliser;
(b)    what the raw materials used in the manufacture of the fertiliser are;
(c)    whether the materials are available locally;
(d)    what other products NCZ manufactures; and
(e)    whether the equipment at the plant is obsolete.
